kizuna_math_d_01:
[BD06:0][trnm:0]! Help me keep an eye
out,\r
would you?[npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_02:
I’ve set up a little ambush here for that girl who
keeps watching me! She’ll be here any second![npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_03:
Well, you see, it’s not very pleasant knowing
she’s just staring at me all the time.[npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_04:
And now I know what she looks like after seeing
her in the cafeteria![npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_06:
It’s you, isn’t it?! You’re the one who’s been
secretly watching me recently![npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_woman_02: I guess you must have noticed me... I-I’m so sorry!
kizuna_math_d_07:
Well, of course I noticed—you were watching me
practically all day every day, after all!\c
I assume there’s something you want to ask me?[npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_woman_04:
I’ve been a huge fan of yours since your time as
a Gym Leader! And I love Rock-type moves so\r
very much!
kizuna_math_d_woman_05:
But you just suddenly retired from your post as
Gym Leader a year and a half ago...\c
Why did you quit?!
kizuna_math_d_09: My goodness... Is that all you wanted to ask?[npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_woman_06:
Yes. Your reason for retiring was never
made public...
kizuna_math_d_woman_07:
but it’s well known among the students here that
you just avoid the question any time it’s asked.
kizuna_math_d_woman_08:
I thought it would be rude to ask you a question
that you don’t want to answer...so I just couldn’t\r
find the courage to ask.
kizuna_math_d_10:
So that’s why your gaze felt so very intense. I see.
Forgive me.[npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_11:
Ah, never mind that. As for the reason I quit my
job as Gym Leader, I simply wanted to focus\r
more on my job as a teacher.[npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_12:
It’s not that I disliked being a Gym Leader or
anything of that sort.[npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_13:
Quite the contrary—talking about the Gym fills
me with feelings of nostalgia and sadness.[npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_14:
That’s why I always avoid answering the question
when students ask.[npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_woman_11:
Do you have any plans of becoming a Gym
Leader again?
kizuna_math_d_15: No, I’m afraid I don’t plan to do so.[npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_16:
My sister is doing a splendid job as Gym Leader
in my stead.[npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_17:
I personally find being a teacher most enjoyable
these days.[npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_18:
But since I am, in fact, your teacher...I would
appreciate it if you would call me “Ms. Tyme,”\r
as students do, and not just “Tyme.”[npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_woman_12: OK. I’m sad to hear that, but I understand!
kizuna_math_d_woman_13: Thank you so much, Ms. Tyme!
kizuna_math_d_19: Well, I suppose that solves the mystery![npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_20:
Ahhh, that made me so nervous! I said so many
things to try to sound cool![npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_21:
I was certainly a little scared when I felt that girl’s
intense gaze on me.[npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_22:
But having you here with me allowed me to do
what needed to be done to face what turned out\r
to be one of my biggest fans.[npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_23:
I must thank you for always showing up at just the
right time, [trnm:0].[npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_24:
Allow me to show you my appreciation a little.
I hope these help on your adventure.[npcn:25]
kizuna_math_d_system_01: You formed a close bond with Ms. Tyme!
